duties_responsibilities.duty: Design visually captivating one sheets and landing pages based on given brand guidelines and campaign objectives.
Translate client needs and branding strategies into design strategies.
Ensure that designs are optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Work closely with marketing and content teams to ensure that the designs meet campaign objectives and are consistent with the brand voice and style.
Keep up with the latest design trends, especially those relevant to digital marketing and brand storytelling.
Ensure all designs are properly organized and saved in easily accessible formats. Deliver finalized assets in the required formats.
Test landing pages across browsers and devices to ensure optimal appearance and function.
